Statistics: Covariance And Correlation Coefficient

Covariance - measures the correlation between two random variables.

Population covariance:


Correlation coefficient - the ratio of the covariance of the two variables to the product of their standard deviations.

Correlation coefficient

The above formula applies for both, sample and population data.
